source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select * from RD.CreditNoteHeader
Where CreditDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, CreditNoteNo

Select * from RD.CreditNoteLine
Where CreditDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, CreditNoteNo

Select * from RD.SalesInvoiceHeader
Where InvoiceDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, InvoiceNo

Select * from RD.SalesInvoiceLine
Where InvoiceDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, InvoiceNo

Select * from RD.SalesOrderHeader
Where OrderDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, OrderNo

Select * from RD.SalesOrderLine
Where OrderDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, OrderNo

Select * from RD.SalesInvoiceDiscount
Where InvoiceDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, InvoiceNo

Select * from RD.SalesInvoiceHeaderDiscount
where (TerritoryCode + SalesCategoryCode + cast(InvoiceNo as varchar)) in 
(Select (TerritoryCode + SalesCategoryCode + cast(InvoiceNo as varchar))
from RD.SalesInvoiceHeader
Where InvoiceDate=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101)))
Order by TerritoryCode, SalesCategoryCode, InvoiceNo

Select * from RD.CurrentSerialBatchDayEnd
where Date=(SELECT convert(datetime,convert(varchar(10),year(getdate()-1)) + '-' +
 convert(varchar(10),month(getdate()-1)) + '-' + convert(varchar(10),day(getdate()-1)), 101))
Order by TerritoryCode, WarehouseCode, LocationCode, ProductCode
